component.meta: Matrix instance configured to allow for spreadsheet-like functionality such as cell-based edits.

Matrix.e:afteredit: jsx3.log('EVENT: (jsxafteredit). Record: ' + strRECORDID + '. New Value: ' + strNEWVALUE);
